abstracts.cdata!:
Ratings for the Education Quality
            Improvement Project for Panama were as follows: the Bank
            performance was moderately unsatisfactory, the Borrower
            performance was rated unsatisfactory, and all other ratings
            are not applicable since the operation is cancelled. The
            project was approved by the Board on August 5, 2008 became
            effective on December 29, 2008; by the time of its
            cancellation in December 2009, none of the activities it
            planned to finance had been executed. The Government
            requested the cancellation of this loan indicating that
            Ministry of Education (MEDUCA) considered that the project
            financed activities that were not a priority for the new administration.
